column1: Article: Coronavirus declared global public health emergency Coronavirus declared global public health emergency https://news.sky.com/story/coronavirus-outbreak-declared-global-public-health-emergency-11922074 Sent via @updayUK

As Covid19 ramps up and spreads, are Britain’s borders still wide open for anyone from anywhere? We talk of banning public gatherings & self-isolation, while every UK Border is wide open with a complementary ferry & care service thrown in from any French shore directly to the UK.

Does Britain’s wide open, anyone-can-come-in borders still apply as Turkey directs millions to Europe & Covid19 spreads? The UK has no border control whatever. It actually runs an illegal migrants support service that begins at any French border directly to Britain & benefits.

Matt, is there a reason UK no longer features on this primary website that maps COVID19? Hiding anything? https://gisanddata.maps.arcgis.com/apps/opsdashboard/index.html#/bda7594740fd40299423467b48e9ecf6
